clonerepo:

Cloning into directory: /home/myself/some-git-dir/someuser/somerepo
Cloning into 'somerepo'... (actually we are not, this is just fake output because you used the test flag)
remote: Enumerating objects: 26, done.
remote: Counting objects: 100% (26/26), done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (22/22), done.
remote: Total 26 (delta 0), reused 26 (delta 0), pack-reused 0
Receiving objects: 100% (26/26), 9.98 KiB | 9.98 MiB/s, done.


clonerepo, when git repo already exists:

Running git pull existing directory: /home/myself/some-git-dir/someuser/somerepo
